snippet: A Greek court on Wednesday handed down 50-year prison sentences to three leading members of the guerrilla group Revolutionary Struggle.
abstract: Greek court hands down 50-year prison sentences to three leading members of guerrilla group Revolutionary Struggle, which is best known for firing rocket-propelled grenade at United States Embassy in Athens in January 2007, and imposes shorter terms on two others suspected of being members.
lead_paragraph: A Greek court on Wednesday handed down 50-year prison sentences to three leading members of the guerrilla group Revolutionary Struggle.
